Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
Overridable with transparent national defaults; record provenance.
Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
Carbon fraction for aboveground and shrub biomass required
RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
Defaults unless justified site-/species-specific data available.
RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
Root:shoot ratio required for trees and shrubs
If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.

C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF

C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF

CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12
Stoichiometric conversion (44/12). Output: t CO2e ha-1.

Convert carbon to CO2e
Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
Zero excluded pools via boundary rules.
Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
Annual net GHG removals (project)
leakage = L_AS + L_MD
Zero under specific AR-TOOL15 conditions; else compute via tool equations.
